title: House of Golf 2
description:
Who will reign supreme in your household ? Gather up to 4 players for the ultimate couch play experience. House of Golf 2 is tailor-made for lively gatherings and family fun. Over 100 meticulously crafted holes to conquer, new holes unlocked by Live Tournament and Events.
Unleash your creativity and skill with our innovative Trick Score System. Showcase your mastery with jaw-dropping shots, ricocheting around corners and defying gravity to earn impressive scores and wow your friends.
Ready to test your mettle ? Dive into Live Tournaments and compete on dynamic courses for exciting prizes—from coins to exclusive skins and golf balls. There’s always a new challenge to conquer and rewards to claim. Don’t miss out—grab your virtual clubs and make your mark

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i5-4590, AMD FX-4350, or equivalent
system_requirements.Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070, Radeon RX Vega 56, or equivalent DX11/DX12 GPU
